channel.title: Help with platebodies and hats
channel.description: Ok so whenever I try to wear Bandos chestplate, it will like show my shirt and arms threw it, the ones that you design on the makeover mage. And whenever I put on a helmet or hat, It will show a hole where my chin should be, can anyone help me fix these problems?

item.title: Help with platebodies and hats
item.dc:creator: @Lewpscape Lewpscape
item.description:
@Lewpscape wrote:

Ok I got it where it doesnâ€™t show the shirt top on the chestplate, but it still shows the shirt sleves through it, any help on that ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with platebodies and hats
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Sometimes you need to put the item ID into more than one array in the Item(or whatever your source uses to equip items) class.

Put a helmet ID in the following arrays:

hats[]
fullHelm[]
fullMask[]

Put a platebody that is glitching into the following arrays:

platebody[]
body[]

Read full topic
